p: During both phases, the respondents were instructed to sort the Q-sample by means of Likert scaling based on the respondent’s attitude regarding the thematic statements, a process known as Q-sorting. The Likert-scale ranges are Strongly Agree (+3), Agree (+2), Slightly Agree (+1), Neutral (0), Slightly Disagree (−1), Disagree (−2) and Strongly Disagree (−3).
